wiki.summary: On this track, 21 Savage delivers a menacing banger about gang violence and his experience with lethal weapons. He always remains alert and prepared for any danger, even keeping a “Glock in his lap” in the event that a contentious situation arises. Metro Boomin reunites with Southside (they make up So Icey Boyz) and Honorable C.N.O.T.E. for the song’s theatrical production. “Glock in My Lap” debuted at #19 on the Billboard Hot 100 during the chart week of October 17, 2020. Read more on Last.fm.
